arts.ttl: Serie A: Inter vs. Torino – probable line-ups and where to watch on TV
arts.sum: Lautaro Martinez and Marcus Thuram will start for Inter against Torino tonight in the final...
The opening Serie A Enilive matchday will finish in style as Inter face Torino at San Siro. Matchday 1 of Serie A Enilive ends at San Siro with Inter vs Torino.

arts.ttl: Revealed – Win-Loss Record Ahead Of Inter Milan Vs Torino Serie A Opener
arts.sum: Inter Milan have won 76 of their matches against Torino in Serie A over the years. As FCInter1908 note, the Nerazzurri and the Granata have met 162 times in the league over the years. Torino have won 36 of these meetings, whilst fifty of the matches have ended in draws.
